attributes.additional_details:
I'm trying to make sure that all ingredients in food HAVE to be listed, "herbs", "spices", "natural ingredients" are just a few examples of how vague food packaging is. Who knows what kind of pepper that is? Who knows what spices are in that sausage roll?
We need to make sure that things are listed correctly to save people with allergies from having to suffer reactions at the hands of those who do not list what is in our food.

We as country have the legal right to know what we are consuming and to not be made unwell by unlisted or vague ingredients.
